ValidationRule.description: "Temporary Solution Provided Date cannot be set directly. Instead you must accept the corresponding deliverable i.e. Temporary Solution Provided."
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(($Setup.CH_CaseStatus_Validation_Bypass__c.CH_Disable_Validation_Rules__c = false), AND($Profile.Name <> "Data Loader Profile", CH_RecordTypeCheck__c, NOT(CH_IsCompleteTemporarySolution__c), NOT(ISNULL(CH_TemporarySolutionProvided__c))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: "Temporary Solution Provided Date cannot be set directly. Instead you must accept the corresponding deliverable i.e. Temporary Solution Provided."
